answers.answer: I was wondering the same thing too. Kinda of want it to happen on it's own I found out about my baby Boy at 30weeks now I'M 34weeks nervous as Heck.

My first labor was veeery easy, that im so scared of what my second one will be like. My son is almost 4, and im having a girl this time. Only 18 weeks. Im scared of going into labor on my own because I get scared that by time I get to the hospital it will be tooo late to get the epidural. Lol

It really depends on the pregnancy and your body...with my first I was induced due to preeclampsia, my 2nd my water broke and I went into labor naturally, and with my 3rd I was induced at 39w4d because he was stubborn
How did you know you had preclampsia and when were you induced?

I was induced at 37 weeks...I went to the doc and there was protein in my urine and my blood pressure was high so they sent me to the hospital where I took a 24 hr urine test and sat under observation for a couple days then my doc decided it was best to induce
See doctors really don't want to see me since I found out so late but I have horrible head aches and my feet and hands swell
I would just go to the hospital then...they have to see you and they'll be able to make sure everything is ok
With my first I was 9days late and with my 2nd I went into labor on here due date so she was 1day over x

question: With my first baby I was induced , and was wondering if with your second pregnancy your more likely to go into labor on your own? Just curious.
title: mommies to 2 or more kids
